title: Barclays Computers (PVT) Ltd. - KEYBOARD-KLS-5 - A4 Tech X-Slim Mini KLS-5 Keyboard(6M)
specs: Manufacturer's product descriptionThe innovative A4 design team has created the slimmest profile in today's keyboard market. The A4Tech Mini X-Slim Keyboard incorporates seven internet hot keys, one-touch keys which allow the user to search, navigate Web pages, select Favorites, explore many options which are all required in today's fast paced computing World.GeneralDevice Type: KeyboardForm Factor: ExternalWidth: 32.3 cmDepth: 16.5 cmHeight: 1.2 cmWeight: 0.54 kgInput deviceConnectivity Technology: WiredInterface: PS/2, USBButtons Qty: 7Key/Button Function: Power, internet browsing, e-mailFeatures: Natural A-shape Key LayoutExpansion / connectivityConnections: 1 x USB - 4 PIN USB Type A 1 x keyboard - generic - 6 pin mini-DIN (PS/2 style) MiscellaneousCables Included: 1 x keyboard adapterSoftware / system requirementsOS Required: Microsoft Windows 98, Microsoft Windows NT 4.0, Microsoft Windows 2000, Microsoft Windows Millennium Edition, Microsoft Windows XP, Apple MacOS 8.5 - 9.x
